targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "org" =~ /^$org_name$/ AND "space" =~ /^$space_name$/ AND "application" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "state" = 'ok' AND "peer" = 'server' AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "org" =~ /^$org_name$/ AND "space" =~ /^$space_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "peer" = 'server' AND "state" = 'ok' AND "status_code" =~ /^2[0-9]+$/ AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "org" =~ /^$org_name$/ AND "space" =~ /^$space_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "peer" = 'server' AND "state" = 'ok' AND "status_code" =~ /^5[0-9]+$/ AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "org" =~ /^$org_name$/ AND "space" =~ /^$space_name$/ AND  "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "peer" = 'server' AND "state" = 'ok' AND "status_code" =~ /^4[0-9]+$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT "event", "value" FROM "app event" WHERE "state" != 'expired' AND "application" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "application", "application" fill(null)

SELECT count("value") FROM "http response time_ms" WHERE "org" =~ /^$org_name$/ AND "space" =~ /^$space_name$/ AND  "host" =~ /^$app_name$/ AND "peer" = 'client' AND "state" = 'ok' AND "status_code" =~ /^(4|5)[0-9]+$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "status_code", "application" fill(null)
